Enterprise / Employer Workers / Employee Self Employed Worker
Unorganised-Sector Problem Over 94% of India’s working population is part of unorganized sector. The unorganized sector has low productivity and offers low wages, even though It accounted for over 94% of worker. Due to this problem is faced by everyone (Employees, employers, the Government). Most of the time people are not aware of their rights and benefits/schemes provided by government. This app helps Both the parties By informing their rights and Benefits of being Organised.
Choose your category Next
